Self.Wiki: This map object represents an in-game entity, used for enemies, characters and interaction points that make use of the Talk system.

CollisionName.Wiki: The collision that controls loading of the enemy.

ThinkParamID.Wiki: The AI parameters this character should use.

NPCParamID.Wiki: The property parameters this character should use.

TalkID.Wiki: The ID of a talk ESD used by the character.

CharaInitID.Wiki: The ID in CharaInitParam determining equipment and stats for humans.

PointMoveType.Wiki: The type of patrolling this enemy will do.

PlatoonID.Wiki: The platoon formation this enemy follows

WalkRouteName.Wiki: The walk route this enemy follows.

BackupEventAnimID.Wiki: The animation ID for this enemy to idle with.
